description: Blue Star (Amsonia 'Seaford Skies') is a beautiful choice for any garden. The fine-textured foliage turns a stunning gold in autumn. This perennial blooms for several weeks in early spring with delightful clusters of delicate blue-centred, star-shaped flowers. On hot summer days, its branches arch gracefully over paths or patio seating areas creating a beautiful, cooling shade. With its ability to attract butterflies and its tolerance for dry soil, this low maintenance shrub is a valuable addition to any landscape.
